document_data.name: Arrr, Yarrr, and Garrr: A Guide to the Pirate Idiom
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arrr, Yarrr, and Garrr: A Guide to the Pirate Idiom''''' was a reference [[book]] found on the [[Sea of Swords]] and the [[Nelanther Islands]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, ''Arrr, Yarrr, and Garrr'' was already in its third printing, ever-popular among new [[pirate]]s. Several copies of the reference book could be found in the pirate-ridden [[Spindrift Town]] of the Nelanther Islands.
